text:
$$\frac{a}{c}=0.075$$，那么$$a=0.075c=\frac{75}{1000}c=\frac{3}{40}c$$
所以c必须是40的倍数，才能保证a是整数
$$\frac{b}{c}=0.09$$，那么$$b=0.09c=\frac{9}{100}c$$
所以c必须是100的倍数，才能保证b是整数
综上，c是40和100的公倍数，
故而，c最小是40和100的最小公倍数，即200
trans:
Given that:𝑎$$\frac{a}{c}=0.075$$，Therefore, $$a=0.075c=\frac{75}{1000}c=\frac{3}{40}c$$
For a to be an integer, c must be a multiple of 40.
Similarly: $$\frac{b}{c}=0.09$$，Therefore, $$b=0.09c=\frac{9}{100}c$$
For b to be an integer, c must be a multiple of 100.
In conclusion, c must be a common multiple of both 40 and 100.
Therefore, the smallest such multiple is the least common multiple of 40 and 100, which is 200.
